attributes.action: End the IPP sentence which is now inhumane
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to do this to put things right, they have already ruined a lot of life’s and prisoners should no longer be on this sentence when this has been proven to be inhumane
attributes.background: The government to end the IPP sentence for those prisoners who was given this sentence back in 2006 when it first come out as this sentence is now inhumane!
